name: wordpress-firebase-custom-token-service
description: Endpoint which bridges user authentication of Wordpress JWT and Firebase Auth

scripts.pm2prodcleandeploy: pm2 deploy ecosystem.config.js prod setup && pm2 deploy ecosystem.config.js prod && pm2 save
scripts.pm2devcleandeploy: pm2 deploy ecosystem.config.js dev setup && pm2 deploy ecosystem.config.js dev && pm2 save
scripts.pm2proddeploy: pm2 deploy ecosystem.config.js prod && pm2 save
scripts.pm2devdeploy: pm2 deploy ecosystem.config.js dev && pm2 save
scripts.pm2proddeployforce: pm2 deploy ecosystem.config.js prod --force && pm2 save
scripts.pm2devdeployforce: pm2 deploy ecosystem.config.js dev --force && pm2 save
scripts.pm2devdeploydestroy: pm2 deploy ecosystem.config.js dev run "pm2 delete "LoginAPI"" && pm2 save
scripts.pm2proddeploydestroy: pm2 deploy ecosystem.config.js prod run "pm2 delete "LoginAPI"" && pm2 save
scripts.pm2devdeploycleanup: pm2 deploy ecosystem.config.js dev run "pm2 flush"
scripts.pm2proddeploycleanup: pm2 deploy ecosystem.config.js prod run "pm2 flush"
scripts.pm2devdeploylogs: pm2 deploy ecosystem.config.js dev run "pm2 logs "LoginAPI""
scripts.pm2proddeploylogs: pm2 deploy ecosystem.config.js prod run "pm2 logs "LoginAPI""

author: Jakub Mucha
